*Description:*<br/>
A headbutt is a strike with the head, typically involving the use of robust parts of the cranium as area of impact. This attack must be done while in a bear hug, if the brawler isnt in a bear hug, one is started automatically. The brawler is left in the bear hug after the attack.

<br/>
<br/>
